mapper.insert:

insert into sctrans.T_TO_EVA_PRICING
CASE_CODE,
EVA_CODE,
EVA_TYPE,
ORIGIN_PRICE,
LOAN_BANK,
FIN_ORG_ID,
TOTAL_PRICE,
EVAL_TIME,
ARISER_ID,
CREATE_TIME,

SELECT @@IDENTITY
insert into sctrans.T_TO_EGU_PROPERTY_INFO
EVA_CODE,
RESIDENCE_NAME,
FLOOR,
TOTAL_FLOOR,
AREA,
COMPLETE_YEAR,
HOUSE_AGE,

mapper.update:
UPDATE sctrans.T_TO_EVA_PRICING
STATUS = '1', COMPLETE_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
FIN_ORG_ID = #{finorgId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
EVAL_TIME = #{evalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = '2', REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
UPDATE sctrans.T_TO_EVA_PRICING SET STATUS = '2' WHERE PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM sctrans.T_TO_EVA_PRICING WHERE CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATUS != '2'
SELECT PKID id, FIN_ORG_NAME name FROM sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG WHERE FA_FIN_ORG_CODE = 'P00'
mapper.update:
UPDATE sctrans.T_TO_EVA_PRICING SET CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT};
UPDATE epi SET epi.RESIDENCE_NAME = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM sctrans.T_TO_EGU_PROPERTY_INFO epi INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_EVA_PRICING ep ON ep.EVA_CODE = epi.EVA_CODE WHERE ep.PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT};
mapper.select: SELECT pri.PKID, pri.EVA_CODE, pri.ARISER_ID, pri.EVA_TYPE, pri.LOAN_BANK, pri.ORIGIN_PRICE, pri.TOTAL_PRICE, pri.EVAL_TIME, pro.RESIDENCE_NAME, pro.FLOOR, pro.TOTAL_FLOOR, pro.AREA, pro.COMPLETE_YEAR, pro.PROP_TYPE, pro.ROOM, pro.HALL, pro.TOILET, pro.HOUSE_AGE, fin.FIN_ORG_NAME EVA_COMPANY, cas.CASE_CODE, cas.CCAI_CODE, pri.STATUS FROM sctrans.T_TO_EVA_PRICING pri INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_EGU_PROPERTY_INFO pro ON pri.EVA_CODE = pro.EVA_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG fin ON pri.FIN_ORG_ID = fin.PKID LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE cas ON pri.CASE_CODE = cas.CASE_CODE WHERE pri.CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND pri.STATUS != '2'

SELECT pri.PKID, pri.EVA_CODE, pri.ARISER_ID, pri.EVA_TYPE, pri.LOAN_BANK, pri.ORIGIN_PRICE, pri.TOTAL_PRICE, pri.EVAL_TIME, pro.RESIDENCE_NAME, pro.FLOOR, pro.TOTAL_FLOOR, pro.AREA, pro.COMPLETE_YEAR, pro.PROP_TYPE, pro.ROOM, pro.HALL, pro.TOILET, pro.HOUSE_AGE, fin.FIN_ORG_NAME EVA_COMPANY, cas.CASE_CODE, cas.CCAI_CODE, pri.STATUS FROM sctrans.T_TO_EVA_PRICING pri INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_EGU_PROPERTY_INFO pro ON pri.EVA_CODE = pro.EVA_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG fin ON pri.FIN_ORG_ID = fin.PKID LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE cas ON pri.CASE_CODE = cas.CASE_CODE WHERE pri.EVA_CODE = #{evaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
